data.title: The Black running crew, the Boston Marathon, and the Newton Police
data.meta_description: A Black running group in Newton filmed police blocking them from the course; Newton Police say spectators from the group were jumping onto the Marathon course and running alongside participants
data.text: On Marathon Monday, a Black running group in Newton filmed police blocking them from the course. Newton Police say there were spectators from the group jumping onto the Marathon course and running alongside participants. WBUR's Ally Jarmanning joins to discuss.
